participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Open-minded and adventurous, enjoys exploring new relationships and experiences.
participant_1.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. i have three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and fashion-forward, with a passion for luxury items and a strong sense of self.
participant_2.background: my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i like shopping. my family doesn't support my career choices. i currently work for a watch dealer.
